text: {| |} MV Ciara Joie 5 is a passenger ferry owned and operated by Aleson Shipping Lines. She's the former MV Kofuji No.8 and currently acquired by Aleson Shipping. == References == Category:1987 ships Category:Ships built in Japan Category:Ferries of the Philippines Category:Active ships of the Philippines
title: MV Ciara Joie 5
